name: Devourers of Worlds
description:
Welcome to your new job, which consist on serve to The Devourers of Worlds. Don’t fail or it will cost you your own existence! Have a timeless day.

As soon as you receive your first order, you are ready to go and prepare your first planet step by step making sure that you don’t miss any ingredient.

If The Devourers of Worlds are happy with your service you can leave work to go home for one or two Eons until your next working turn.

But... if you fail to serve your orders you will be required to leave your own existence to be offered to The Devourers of Existence.
